body.p:
352
March 11th 5
Leonard Farmer Esq
Barbourville Ky.
Sir

Your letter of the 3d inst, to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to this office. Your company will be received if you will send in the rolls, and comply with the provisions of the inclosed, order at once. As soon as rolls are received all necessary supplies arms &c will be issued by the federal authorities.

Very Respectfully
D W Lindsey
Adj Genl of Ky
